MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Hillend and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a repair on our overhead line network we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.00PM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 3.02PM on 31 October 2020.
